input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Disney Black 3d Stitch Silicone Soft Case Cover for Samsung Galaxy Nexus I9250 I515 NEW

Item specifications:
Made with high quality Silicone
Durable Protection
Very Good hand feeling
Compatible with: samsung Galaxy Nexus i9250
Samsung Galaxy Nexus i515
input_text.Response A: The Disney black 3d stitch silicone soft case for Samsung Galaxy Nexus i9250 and i515 is a durable and stylish way to protect your phone. The case is made with high-quality silicone and features an adorable Disney character in a 3D stitch design. The case provides good protection for your phone and a very good hand feeling. The case is compatible with the Samsung Galaxy Nexus i9250 and i515.
input_text.Response B: Disney fans, your favorite character is here to cheer up your phone.  This high-quality, soft silicone case, decorated with Stitch's cheeky image in 3D gives you a durable, yet comfortable to hold way to protect your Samsung Galaxy Nexus.

label_annotations.feedback: Option A gives more technical Information, compared to response B.
